data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Takêv, Cambodia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Takêv, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Takêv you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 48 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Takêv, Cambodia that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Takêv, Cambodia.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Deaf people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, help the people of Takêv, Cambodia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Takêv, Cambodia to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Takêv, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.
